SEARCH
Package fr.uge.patchwork

Class QuiltBoard

java.lang.Object
fr.uge.patchwork.QuiltBoard
public class QuiltBoard extends Object
Representation of a Quiltboard, used by a player of the PatchWork to store all the patches it is collecting
Author:
VILAYVANH Mickael, BERNIER Valentin

  • Constructor Details

    • QuiltBoard

      QuiltBoard constructor: Create an initialized quiltboard.

  • Method Details

    • getIncome

      public int getIncome()
      Do the sum of each patch's income.
      Returns:
      An {int} that represents the total income.

    • numberOfEmptySpace

      public int numberOfEmptySpace()
      Give the number of empty space.
      Returns:
      An int that represents the total of empty space in the board.

    • placePatch

      public boolean placePatch(Patch patch, Coordinate padding)
      Place a patch given in the quiltboard at the given positions. Current positionX and positionY is subject to change in the near future. The position aimed is the top left corner of the patch.
      Parameters:
      patch - Patch to be placed.
      padding - Coordinate refered in the board.
      Returns:
      true if it could be placed.

    • check7x7Area

      public boolean check7x7Area()
      Checks if the current quiltboard has a 7x7 area.
      Returns:
      false if no checking is requiered or computeChecking() return value otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

    • display

      public void display(Graphics2D graphics)
      Display the quilt board
      Parameters:
      graphics - Graphics2D object used to display

    • coordToCoordinate

      public Coordinate coordToCoordinate(double x, double y)
      Return the Coordinates in the grid of the quilt board that correspond to the mouse coordinates
      Parameters:
      x - X position
      y - Y position
      Returns:
      Coordinates in the grid of the quilt board or - (-1, -1) if rotate button - (-2, -2) if throw button - (-3, -3) if not in the grid

    • displayMini

      public void displayMini(Graphics2D graphics, int xToAdd)
      Display the quilt board
      Parameters:
      graphics - Graphics2D object used to display
      xToAdd - The number of pixels to add to the display
